Title: Relates to the permissible level of rear side window tinting for all vehicles
Summary: Relates to the permissible level of rear side window tinting for all vehicles; provides such vehicles shall have a light transmittance of no less than seventy percent.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the permissible level of rear side window tinting for all vehicles
